sentences.english: Every morning, a fresh offering of bric-a-brac from the grandfather to Cosette.
sentences.chinese: 每天清晨外祖父都送來一些古董給珂賽特。

sentences.english: Fedorova is an only child, and she was brought up by her mother and maternal grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 是單親家庭的女兒，由母親和外祖父祖母撫養長大。

sentences.english: You will overwhelm my grandfather with delight if you play whist.
sentences.chinese: 您會打惠斯特就更使外祖父喜出望外了。

sentences.english: My maternal grandfather is a capitalist, who is a famous "furrier" in the Tianjin bazaar.
sentences.chinese: 外祖父是資本家，是天津勸業場有名的“皮貨商”。

sentences.english: "He is getting decidedly wild," said his grandfather.
sentences.chinese: “老實說，”那位外祖父說，“他真捨得幹。”

sentences.english: Many of the local dignitaries attended his grandfather's funeral.
sentences.chinese: 賣地很多王侯將相都參加了他外祖父的葬禮。

sentences.english: Her grandfather was clean-shaven, with a full head of white hair.
sentences.chinese: 她的外祖父鬍子刮的很乾淨，滿頭銀髮。

sentences.english: Year-old death of his father, to follow the kind of grandmother came to the grandfather's home.
sentences.chinese: 四歲喪父，跟隨慈祥的外祖母來到了外祖父的家中。

sentences.english: This is Obama with his grandparents in daily life together.
sentences.chinese: 這是奧巴馬與外祖父母在一起的生活照。

sentences.english: The grandfather absolutely wasted his poor old smile.
sentences.chinese: 外祖父他老人家可憐的微笑全屬枉然。

sentences.english: One evening, on his return home, he saw his grandfather holding a letter in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 一天傍晚，他回到家裏，看見外祖父手裏捏着一封信。

sentences.english: Childhood and maternal grandfather Stanley Tang Obama Hamsun (Stanley Dunham) playing on the beach. Obama adult eyes, the grandfather is full of people who dream of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 成年後的奧巴馬眼中，外祖父是個充滿自由夢想的人。

sentences.english: My grandparents on my mother's side were both Italians.
sentences.chinese: 我外祖父母都是義大利人。

sentences.english: Former Chinese government mining minister Lu Dong is her grandfather.
sentences.chinese: 中國前冶金工業部部長呂東是她的外祖父。

sentences.english: Papaw liked Roger because he was nice both to me and to him.
sentences.chinese: 外祖父很喜歡羅傑，因爲羅傑對我和他都很好。

sentences.english: The grandfather humbly pulled off his hat and thanked her.
sentences.chinese: 外祖父謙恭地脫下帽子，謝謝她。

definition: older male cousin via female line
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
